title: The pleasant and stately morall, of the three lordes and three ladies of London With the great ioy and pompe, solempnized at their mariages: commically interlaced with much honest mirth, for pleasure and recreation, among many morall obseruations and other important matters of due regard. by R.W.
author: Wilson, Robert, d. 1600.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R. Ihones, at the Rose and Crowne neere Holburne Bridge,
